name: Wizard Defender (The Gamedev Cave)
description:
Wizard defender is a basic tower defense game with an in depth level editor. The game comes included with 3 levels and a secret devmode level you can acces you entering "devmode" into the level box!

Left click to place towers
Right lick to upgrade towers

With the level editor you can, and should, make you own levels and share them with your friends! simply late the savegame files with the level name in the game folder : WizaardDef\Windows\MyProject\Saved\SaveGames and send them to your friends to play!
